ComicInfo.Summary: Indicia notes: All characters as depicted in this story are over the age of 18.There were 500 people on Smoky Island. 498 of them have inhaled a black gas which came from the island. A natural psychoactive that releases every foul thing in the human spirit, rendering its victims little better than zombies. Two people were outside the area of release. One of them has family in town and he doesn't know that they just ran out of warm meat. The boats they need to escape are on the other side of town. Just a little under five hundred cannibal psychopaths are between them and safety. They don't know what's happened in Smoky Island, its history, or what's going to kill them.
